Sheet size (5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high) allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hydrangeas Boxed Stationery Sheets Enjoy the fine art of letter writing with designer stationery sheets and matching envelopes

Add flair to your personal correspondence Beautiful design Take pen in hand and compose a thoughtful letter using these lovely stationery sheets! The hydrangea is said to express genuine heart-to-heart feeling and real appreciation for one's understanding. Crisp white stationery sheets feature a lower right corner hydrangeas motif, in shades of indigo, cerise, and wisteria. Flecks of silver foil add extra flourish. Board box with clear acetate lid contains 30 letter sheets and 24 matching envelopes. Superior stationery sheets Write with confidence. Substantial smooth-finish writing sheets take a variety of pens beautifully. Fountain pens glide over the page. 24 matching envelopes Lilac-hued envelopes match our design. Stationery envelopes are constructed of quality paper.

Beautiful stationery is a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten letter is warranted. Sheet size (5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high) allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch! About our Hydrangeas Letter-Perfect Stationery Sheets: Set comes with 30 designer letter sheets Includes 24 matching stationery envelopes Each sheet measures 5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high Stationery set comes in a sturdy matching box with a clear acetate lid Matches Peter Pauper Press's other Hydrangeas gifts and stationery
Hydrangeas Desk Notes Set Hydrangeas Large Address Book Hydrangeas Large Format Internet Address & Password Logbook Hydrangeas Thank You Notes Hydrangeas Small Journal Hydrangeas Beaded Bookmark

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter—and later, his wife, Edna—sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy—and our customers’ expectations—of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality and Fountain pen friendly!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set in the hopes that it was an affordable, fountain pen friendly choice for writing letters. It's absolutely beautiful and very much want I wanted in terms of quality. Depending on the wetness of the fountain pen, there is no ghosting and definitely no bleed through. The paper is A5 size, which I wasn't expecting. Although I wanted a letter size page, this product exceeded my expectation and needs. I highly recommend this for any one who wants simple, but high quality paper for writing letters.Pros:-Fountain pen friendly-No ghosting or bleedthrough-Pretty and not gaudy-Can write on both sides of the sheetCons:-A5 sized (stated on the page but not emphasized)-Can be a little pricey for the size of pages

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth paper and hearty envelopes!
reviews.reviewText: I received my paper set and immediately got to work writing a letter for my spouse. I love the cardstock and the envelopes are hearty enough that the paper inside is protected. Very cute and great for little love letters or pen pals. Would recommend to family and friends c:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars pretty paper, nice size.
reviews.reviewText: The flowers have a small dots of gold that are pretty and don't come off. The size is slightly less than 8x6. it fits my writing box and the amount I usually write.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely pattern, good quality
reviews.reviewText: Got these for letter writing during the pandemic. Lovely pattern, just a little bit of silver foil makes them feel a little special. Nice quality paper - not chintzy feeling. Came with nice Color matched lavender envelopes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but small
reviews.reviewText: The paper is pretty but it is rather small. It did it's intended use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stationery set
reviews.reviewText: Great little set for the price. I bought it as a gift for a senior citizen at Christmas time, so I actually did not use it myself. However, I felt completely confident to give it as a gift as the quality appeared wonderful. The quantity of paper/envelopes was great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful paper for a wonderful price!
reviews.reviewText: This paper is even better than I expected! Thick, Smooth and Beautiful to write on with my Sakura Microns, no bleed thru AT ALL. Now I just wish they had a few more choices that I liked so I could order more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the stationery set.
reviews.reviewText: The stationery set is absolutely beautiful.
Smooth writing surface. Paper stock is nice and has some substance. Not thin and flimsy. Wrote using a fountain pen and no bleed through. Was able to write back and front of paper.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple, beautiful and practical stationary set!
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful, simple stationary for those who still enjoy sending a personal touch; a must for the nearly extinct art of letter writing! Unlike other decorated stationary, the design stands out but does not impede your writing… Still giving you plenty of space to write your letter without it being covered up by the pattern. Beautiful envelopes to match, definitely would be a treat for anyone to receive. Thank you so much for offering this on Amazon.ca!Makes a great gift for anyone who still enjoys sending a personal touch. 🙏🏼📝💌
Very nice quality and great price! Will definitely be ordering more from this seller.
